app_descript:
Back Market - The Refurbished Electronics Supermarket

Brief

Back Market is revolutionizing how we view and purchase refurbished electronics. With an ethos of sustainability, it's a one-stop marketplace offering an array of expertly renewed gadgets. It prides itself on delivering products that are less costly than new but safer and more reliable than typical secondhand buys. Join over 5 million customers who have chosen Back Market for affordable, top-tier tech without the ecological footprint.
